rooms.description: Spacious living area with integrated kitchenette for efficient space use, minimalistic design.
Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed using Vastu principles placing it in the north-east corner to promote energy balance. Minimal decor for a bachelor pad style.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage and functional space, placed adjacent to master bedroom for privacy while remaining accessible.
Multi-functional study/workspace area with built-in shelving; designed as a quiet zone.
Guest bedroom that doubles as a home office, ensuring flexibility on a tight budget.
Full bathroom adjacent to master bedroom and guest bedroom; includes water-efficient fixtures.
